author: marioevz
content:
Hi all, the hive CL mock test vectors for the execution clients have been merged to ethereum/hive master: https://github.com/ethereum/hive/tree/master/simulators/ethereum/engine
I'm keeping a tracking page for the test results over here:
https://notes.ethereum.org/xnKiAcNlT2aZ66DdH8LM6g?view
At the moment the tests have only been executed in geth and nethermind, because changes are necessary to the hive client in order to run the tests.
Please reach out to me and I can help out running the test on remaining clients üôå
